comments:
200312162000

I've gotten a "Launch (Cancelled)" message in the Progress view when no launch
was cancelled.  This happened after the first time I tried to launch a runtime
workbench.  I had just checked out platform-UI from CVS, opened a java file and
made a simple change, built and launched.  The launch succeeded but that message
appeared (and remains).  I've tried to reproduce this but without success.

Created an attachment (id=7211)
Workbench image showing odd combination
Moving to platform/debug since they provide launch.
Anything in your .log that might be related?
I have not found a way to reproduce this. Closing for now.

I've reproduced this problem (or something very similar) in 200312182000.  I've
been working in the workspace for some time now and I wanted to check some
changes I've made in UI.  I've been launching runtime workspaces fine all
morning however the last one I tried launching failed and there was no history
added to the debug view to that effect.  Launch (Cancelled) appeared in the
Progress View and I got the following entry in my .log:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.pde.core 4 4 Jan 05, 2004 10:04:16.468
!MESSAGE Exception caught while creating platform configuration.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at java.util.TreeMap.compare(TreeMap.java:1081)
	at java.util.TreeMap.getEntry(TreeMap.java:341)
	at java.util.TreeMap.get(TreeMap.java:260)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.TargetPlatform.getLocation(TargetPlatform.java:232)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.TargetPlatform.createConfigIniFile(TargetPlatform.java:206)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.core.TargetPlatform.createPlatformConfigurationArea(TargetPlatform.java:171)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.getProgramArguments(WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:139)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.createVMRunner(WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:86)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.launcher.WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.launch(WorkbenchLaunchConfigurationDelegate.java:47)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:156)
	at
org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:740)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools.buildAndLaunch(DebugUITools.java:625)
	at org.eclipse.debug.ui.DebugUITools$3.run(DebugUITools.java:581)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

Every time I try to launch my configuration it fails with the same exception but
no new Progress message.  Launching a newly created configuration fails as well.
 Restarting the workbench allows both configurations to be launched successfully.
NPE is in PDE. Moving there.
*** Bug 51493 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

fixed.
This NPE occurs if the install.ini of your target platform does not contain 
the "feature.default.id" key.
